sectiontype.name: directorystorage
sectiontype.description: A full storage which keeps data in a directory structure using a number of files.

key.name: read-only
key.description: If true, only reads may be executed against the storage. Note that the "pack" operation is not considered a write operation and is still allowed on a read-only storage.

key.name: path
key.description: Path name to the main storage directory. The names for supplemental files, including data files, configuration files, and lock files, will be computed from this.
